abstract: United States men's basketball team, while still overwhelming Olympic favorites, heads into knockout stage looking increasingly vulnerable after pair of narrow wins; opponents are encouraged by team's relative dearth of experience as unit, which has led to defensive breakdowns and lack of offensive rhythm.
lead_paragraph: As the knockout stage begins on Wednesday, the Americans are still the heavy favorites to win in Rio. But opponents, taking note of heartened by recent close games, say the team is vulnerable.
snippet: As the knockout stage begins on Wednesday, the Americans are still the heavy favorites to win in Rio. But opponents, taking note of heartened by recent close games, say the team is vulnerable....

headline.main: U.S. Men’s Basketball Team’s Latest Foes See Flaws, Not Routs
